message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $11,500. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from this product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,800 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $10,900. This is my final offer.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $10,450. Can you consider this offer?
